title: AI Search Art
content:
Welcome to AI Search Art! Our website is dedicated to showcasing the beauty of artificial intelligence through abstract art. Our main wallpaper features an illustration of an AI-powered search engine, with a minimalist and modern design, set against a gradient background. 

We believe that AI technology has the power to transform our world in countless ways, and we want to celebrate its potential through art. Our collection includes a variety of abstract pieces that explore different aspects of AI, from its impact on society to its inner workings. 

Whether you're an AI enthusiast or simply appreciate beautiful art, we invite you to explore our collection and discover the many ways that AI can inspire creativity and innovation. Thanks for visiting AI Search Art!

prompts.title:
Write me short (max 3 words) title for website with main wallpaper that is:

"A wallpaper featuring an abstract illustration of an AI-powered search engine, with a minimalist and modern design, set against a gradient background."

The title should not be 1:1 copy of the prompt but rather a short description of the website which is using this wallpaper.
prompts.content:
Write me some content for this website in markdown format.
The content should be a short description of the website which is using this wallpaper.

- You can include UTF-8 emojis
- You can use formatting like **bold** or _italic_
- Do not describe the wallpaper itself, but rather the website which is using it.
- Do not start with any title - title will be included automatically
- Do not include links
- Do not include images
